Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Axe handle
Description: Braided leather axe grip. Three straps of leather were secured at the top and bottom of the axe and were braided in between these two points. There are two protuberances at the two extremities of the handle.
